Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Player creates a player with a Point position, integer health, and booleans for having a map and a key. A player also has integer attackStrength for fighting monsters in the maze and a random number generator to give random attack hit points to monsters Player is the hero object in the game MazeGame and MazeGameGUI
    Since:
    July 20, 2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Default constructor sets the position to Point (0,0), health to 35, attackStrength to 7 and hasKey and hasMap booleans to false
      Player(Player p)
      Copy constructor copies the location health and attackStrength from another player object into the new object being constructed.
      Player(Point p, int heal, int strength)
      Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and initial health to heal, and attackStrength to strength.

      Mutator sets Player health to zero, removes items Key and Map, and outputs a death message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor sets the position to Point (0,0), health to 35, attackStrength to 7 and hasKey and hasMap booleans to false

      • Player

        public Player(Point p,
              int heal,
              int strength)
        Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and initial health to heal, and attackStrength to strength.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point where the player is located on initialization.
        heal - an integer to set the initial health level of the player.
        strength - an integer to set the attack strength of the player

      • Player

        public Player(Player p)
        Copy constructor copies the location health and attackStrength from another player object into the new object being constructed.
        Parameters:
        p - A Player object to be copy constructed.

      • getPosition

        public Point getPosition()
        Accessor to get the position of the player as a Point object.
        Returns:
        a Point with the position of the player object.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Accessor to get the health of a player as.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the health of the player.

      • getHasKey

        public boolean getHasKey()
        Accessor to get the boolean value of hasKey
        Returns:
        a boolean representing the state of hasKey, true if player has the key.

      • getHasMap

        public boolean getHasMap()
        Accessor to get the boolean value of hasMap
        Returns:
        a boolean representing the state of hasMap, true if player has the map.

        Returns:

                        int y)
        Mutator to set the position of a player object given input integer coordinates x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - an integer representing the x-coordinate.
        y - an integer representing the y-coordinate.

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(int healthIn)
        Mutator to set the health of a player to input healthIn if a positive integer otherwise do nothing.
        Parameters:
        healthIn - an integer representing the new player health.

      • addHealth

        public void addHealth(int amount)
        Mutator to increase the health of a player by a positive amount. Does nothing if input amount is negative.
        Parameters:
        amount - a positive integer amount to increase player health by.

      • setHasKey

        public void setHasKey(boolean val)
        Mutator to set the status of whether the player has the key.
        Parameters:
        val - a boolean to set the status of hasKey, input true if player has the key, false to set that they don't have the key.

      • setHasMap

        public void setHasMap(boolean val)
        Mutator to set the status of whether the player has the map.
        Parameters:
        val - a boolean to set the status of hasMap, input true if player has the map, false to set that they don't have the map.

      • setAttackStrength

        public void setAttackStrength(int strength)
        Mutator to set the player Attack Strength.
        Parameters:
        strength - an integer value representing the player attack strength.

      • takesDamage

        public void takesDamage(int damage)
        Mutator to set the amount of damage the player recieives from an enemy or monster
        Parameters:
        damage - a positive integer value representing the damage to a player inflicted by a monster. If negative does nothing.

      • attacks

        public void attacks(Monster m)
        Mutator to inflict damage upon a monster object.
        Parameters:
        m - a Monster object to attack.

        public void moveDown()
        Mutator to move the player position down by one spot.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Accessor returns a boolean value as to whether the player is alive, namely their health >0.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true if player is alive with health > 0 , false if player has health <=0.

      • die

        public void die()
        Mutator sets Player health to zero, removes items Key and Map, and outputs a death message.

      • displayStats

        public void displayStats()
        Accessor displays Player Statistics in a decorative manner.
